SEARCH
Package main

Class Ballot

java.lang.Object
main.Ballot
public class Ballot extends Object
The Ballot class pretends to be what it stands for, ballots belonging to candidates in electoral processes in class Election.
Version:
3/15/2023
Author:
Carlos J. Pepin Delgado

  • Constructor Details

    • Ballot

      public Ballot(String line, interfaces.List<Candidate> candidates)
      Creates a ballot based on the line it receives. The format for line is id#,candidate_name . It also receives a List of all the candidates in the elections.
      Parameters:
      line - (CSV File line to be parsed)
      candidates -

      Parameters:
      candidateId -
      Returns:

    • getBallotType

      public int getBallotType()
      Returns:
      an integer that indicates if the ballot is: 0 – valid, 1 – blank or 2 - invalid

    • getCandidateByRank

      public int getCandidateByRank(int rank)
      Parameters:
      rank -
      Returns:
      the candidate id with that rank, if no candidate is available return -1.

    • getRankByCandidate

      public int getRankByCandidate(int candidateID)
      Parameters:
      candidateID -
      Returns:
